title: Client Bug? (forced a ranked match dodge)
body: right, so here i am queuing after a terrible loss, and after pressing accept, a "Already In Game" noticed appeared in the middle of my screen, though my character status said "In champion select" and the sounds from champion select could be heard, it forced me to dodge this match? i had no chance to select a champion, or even use the chat? what can be done about this? will i be able to have those point back? i have enough trouble as it is in ranked but if this is going to become a common occurrence whats the point? any help would be more then appreciated.

replies.body:
Some similarity to what happened to me.
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/xp0E6wOg-rare-but-very-serious-client-issue

I raised a support ticket and was told to post on this board instead, so I think either the advice from Horse of Force is wrong, or I was given the wrong info from support.

oh wtf that's what they're saying about this? I haven't made a ticket myself, and no one said that *they* made a ticket, so naturally I thought handing it over to the people who are actually related to the company that made the game would be better than anything I can offer. It's not exactly like I can change the programming of it.

Man, I wish the reds wouldn't completely ignore my posts. I'd be able to tell them a lot about the issues that a lot of people are facing, and possible solutions to them within the programming of the game.

Something glitched, that's for sure. Have you tried repairing your client? Also, I suggest testing in custom games until you're sure you fixed it.

[Submit a support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) about this if you haven't already. What ISP are you with?
